A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: One of the most complex and daring entries in the Saga\, The Last Jedi to me will\, eventually\, be considered of the same-- if not higher\, caliber as Empire Strikes Back after the storm dies down.\n\nThe crew took risks and brought the series to a place it has never been before. It's dark\, funny\, epic\, full of hope as well as the lack-thereof.
